column2: This mod includes a large number of extremely-powerful targetted decisions, which allow the host a huge amount of control over an ongoing game. These are flagged with the special "§P(ED:MP:Intf)§!" prefix in the right-click menu. Due to the potential for accidental game-ruining error, §Yyou should keep these decisions hidden at all times unless you are actively using them§!.
All applicable §P(ED:MP:Intf)§! targetted decisions will be visible.\n§M! ! ! Be very careful ! ! !§!

This mod includes a large number of extremely-powerful targetted decisions, which allow the host a huge amount of control over an ongoing game. These are flagged with the special "§P(ED:MP:Intf)§!" prefix in the right-click menu. Due to the potential for accidental game-ruining error, §Yyou should keep these decisions hidden at all times unless you are actively using them§!.
All §P(ED:MP:Intf)§! targetted decisions will be hidden.
Force one of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s wars to end in a white peace.
Create a 10-year truce between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Create a non-aggression pact between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Break a non-aggression pact between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Create an alliance between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
Break an alliance between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and another character.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is imprisoned by a human player.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] grants a favor to a human player.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] is moved to a human player's court.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName] will be granted §YTemporary Vitality§! (§G+20 Health§!) for §Y3 years§!.
[Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s §YTemporary Vitality§! (§G+20 Health§!) will be §Gprolonged§! for §Y3 years§!.
A bilateral 10-year truce is created between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
A non-aggression pact is created between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName].
The non-aggression pact between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] is cancelled.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] does NOT have a favor from [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] and [Root.GetTitledFirstName] have favors on each other
§M(ED:MP)§! Non-aggression pact forcibly removed by host
§M(ED:MP)§! Non-aggression pact forcibly removed by host

§M(ED:MP)§! [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been granted extreme vitality by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding. For as long as this vitality lasts, [Root.GetSheHe] will probably survive any injury or disease that is not immediately fatal.

§M(ED:MP)§! [Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or [Root.GetHerHis] predecessor) has been granted 1,000¤ by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding.\n§g.§!\n§gINFO: This modifier (or stack of modifiers) exists solely for external record-keeping - it has no in-game function, and it is safe to remove via console command.§!

§M(ED:MP)§! [Root.GetTitledFirstName] (or [Root.GetHerHis] predecessor) has had 100¤ removed by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding.\n§g.§!\n§gINFO: This modifier (or stack of modifiers) exists solely for external record-keeping - it has no in-game function, and it is safe to remove via console command.§!
Was killed by a power beyond [Root.GetHerHis] understanding
